pageTitle: KSRTC Bangalore to Ooty Bus Timings

textAfterTable: Bangalore - Ooty Distance: 305 Kms. Booking for the above can be made directly at the website or at one of the many counters run by KSRTC across Bangalore. Ooty is popular as a long weekend getaway from Bangalore, and hence it is suggested to make bus ticket booking in advance especially if your travel is on weekends. Bangalore - Ooty buses travel via Mysore - Nanjanud- Gundulpet- Ooty Rajahamsa Service :These are non air conditioned buses in 2x2 configuration Airavat (Volvo) : These are airconditioned buses with comfortable reclining seats.Buses are fitted with full Air Suspension for superior ride quality. The Bangalore - Ooty bus timings mentioned above is accurate at the time of writing this article. Please check latest timings by contacting the official sources. The information is provided only to help you plan your holiday. Ooty Accommodation Ooty is the most popular hill station in South India. To help plan your holiday, TravelPaisa has an exhaustive information on Ooty accommodation. Information available include reviews and contact details that will help you to book directly with the hotel. Hotels listed range from no frillsEconomical Ooty Hotels, Ooty Resorts and offbeat Ooty Homestays.
